DOC.brief_title: R115777 Treating Patients Who Have Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine safety effectiveness R115777 patient metastatic pancreatic cancer . II . Determine response rate , time progression , 6 month survival rate patient treatment regimen . III . Assess pharmacokinetics treatment regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive oral R115777 twice daily 21 consecutive day . Treatment continue every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year .
